
### question  {.smaller}

<!-- \lstset{style=small,language=myasm,deletekeywords=bl} -->
 
```
.data
string:
    .asciz "abcdefgh"
.text
    movq $string, %rax // mov RAX, STRING
    movq string, %rdx  // mov RDX, [STRING]
    movb (%rax), %bl   // mov BL, [RAX]
    leal 1(%rbx), %ebx // lea EBX, [RBX+1]
    movb %bl, (%rax)   // mov [RAX], BL
    movq %rdx, 4(%rax) // mov [4+RAX], RDX
```
 [ What is the final value of string?]{.my-small} <table>
<tr><td>a. <code>"abcdabcd"</code></td><td>d. <code>"abcdefgh"</code></td></tr>
<tr><td>b. <code>"bbcdefgh"</code></td><td>e. something else / not enough info</td></tr>
<tr><td>c. <code>"bbcdabcd"</code></td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr>
</table>
